meanings.sent1: She kept rerepeating the same mistake in her math homework.
meanings.sent2: He enjoys rerepeating his favorite song over and over.
meanings.sent3: The parrot rerepeating the phrase made everyone laugh.
meanings.sent4: Her laughter echoed through the room, rerepeating like a joyful melody.
meanings.sent5: The sound of the waves rerepeating against the shore was calming.

meanings.definition: The act of repeating something multiple times.
meanings.sent1: The rerepeating of the instructions helped the students understand better.
meanings.sent2: His speech was filled with unnecessary rerepeating of the same points.
meanings.sent3: The rerepeating of the joke at the party made everyone chuckle.
meanings.sent4: The rerepeating of history often leads to valuable lessons.
meanings.sent5: The rerepeating of the alarm clock woke him up every morning.
